name: Ammunition Thaumaturgy
summary: You're so used to handling your implement, weapon, and esoterica in the heat of combat that adding a few bullets or arrows to the mix is no extra burden.

name: Diverse Lore
summary: Your wandering studies mean you've heard rumors or theories about almost every topic...

name: Divine Disharmony
summary: From your collection of religious trinkets, you pull out opposing divine objects—such as the religious symbols of two deities that are hated enemies—and combine them in a display that causes discordant clashes of divine energy that are especially distracting to the faithful.

name: Familiar
summary: You make a pact with a creature that serves you and assists your spellcasting.

name: Haunt Ingenuity
summary: Your cunning knowledge grants you the ability to notice the emotional echo of a soul that passed on, leaving a haunt in its wake.

name: Root to Life
summary: Marigold, spider lily, pennyroyal—many primal traditions connect flowers and plants with the boundary between life and death, and you can leverage this association to keep an ally on this side of the line.

name: Scroll Thaumaturgy
summary: Your multidisciplinary study of magic means you know how to activate the magic in scrolls with ease.

name: Call Implement
summary: You can tug on the bonds of ownership between yourself and your implement, causing it to find its way back to you.

name: Enhanced Familiar
trait: Druid, Magus, Sorcerer, Thaumaturge, Witch, Wizard
summary: You infuse your familiar with additional primal energy, increasing its abilities.

name: Esoteric Warden
summary: When you apply antithetical material against a creature successfully, you also ward yourself against its next attacks.

name: Talisman Esoterica
summary: You know how to assemble the supernatural objects in your esoterica into a number of temporary talismans.

name: Turn Away Misfortune
trait: Abjuration, Esoterica, Fortune, Manipulate, Occult, Thaumaturge
summary: You perform a superstition, such as casting salt over your shoulder to ward off bad luck.

name: Breached Defenses
summary: You can find the one weak point in a creature's scales, wards, or armor to get past its resistances.

name: Instructive Strike
summary: You attack your foe and analyze how it reacts.

name: Paired Link
summary: You break a trinket such as a lodestone or jade pendant in two, creating a sympathetic link between the halves that bridges distance.

name: Thaumaturgic Ritualist
summary: Your studies into the supernatural have resulted in an especially strong knowledge of rituals.

name: One More Activation
summary: You've forged a deeper bond to your invested items, allowing you to activate them more than usual.

name: Scroll Esoterica
summary: Your esoterica includes scraps of scriptures, magic tomes, druidic markings, and the like, which you can use to create temporary scrolls.

name: Sympathetic Vulnerabilities
prerequisite: Exploit Vulnerability, mortal weakness or personal antithesis
summary: When you apply your will to invoke a vulnerability, the result is more powerful, and the vulnerability ripples out in a web from your main target to affect a broader range of creatures.

name: Cursed Effigy
summary: After your attack, you grab a bit of blood, cut hair, or other piece of the creature's body.

name: Elaborate Talisman Esoterica
summary: As you continue to collect talismanic esoterica, you improve your ability to create temporary talismans.

name: Share Weakness
summary: You select an object from your esoterica that has great personal value to you, such as a locket or treasured ring, and you grant it to an ally, establishing a personal link that allows your ally to affect an enemy as if they were you.

name: Thaumaturge's Investiture
summary: Magical equipment and gear are the tools of your trade, and you know you need as many as possible to help you against the supernatural.

name: Twin Weakness
summary: As you make an attack augmented by your esoterica, you also press your implement against the creature, applying its weakness as your implement's energies sear the creature's flesh.

name: Elaborate Scroll Esoterica
summary: You've picked up more scraps of magic texts, improving your makeshift scrolls.

name: Intensify Investiture
summary: Your bond to your invested items enables you to put more of yourself into them.

name: Shared Warding
summary: You ward your allies from the attacks of your foes whenever you apply those protections to yourself.

name: Thaumaturge's Demesne
summary: You have claimed an area or location as your demesne, granting you the ability to ward and protect it.

name: Esoteric Reflexes
prerequisite: an implement that grants a reaction
summary: Your bond to your implements is so strong that you can use their reactive abilities almost by instinct.

name: Grand Talisman Esoterica
summary: You've completed your journey in studying esoteric talismans, gaining the ability to place multiple talismans on an item.

name: Trespass Teleportation
summary: You can hunt your foe to the ends of creation.

name: Implement's Flight
summary: By weakening your relation to the ground and strengthening your relation to the sky, you've learned to soar through the air, your implement carrying you as surely as any broomstick or pestle.

name: Seven-Part Link
summary: Many traditions hold the number seven as significant.

name: Sever Magic
summary: You apply a frayed thread, a pinch of fulu ash, or a similar undone charm to your weapon, and swing to break a spell.

name: Grand Scroll Esoterica
summary: You've completed the third and final step in your assimilation of scroll esoterica, granting you daily scrolls of incredible power.

name: Implement's Assault
summary: Your implement supercharges your weapon to shoot an impossible volley or carve through your foes.

name: Intense Implement
summary: You have an exceptional link to your third implement.

name: Ubiquitous Weakness
summary: You've nurtured your bonds with your comrades, allowing you to share the benefits of your esoterica.

name: Unlimited Demesne
summary: You can move your demesne here and there, bringing it wherever your journey takes you.

name: Wonder Worker
prerequisite: Legendary in Arcana, Legendary in Nature, Legendary in Occultism, or Legendary in Religion
summary: The thaumaturge's path culminates with the working of wonders.
